title: Three Bed Apartment for Sale at Alexandra Homes
location: Alexandra Homes, No.12, Alexandra Road, Colombo 6
details:
Almost new, unfurnished three bedroom apartment for sale at Alexandra Homes, Wellawatte. Conveniently located on Alexandra Road, only 100m from Galle Road & 250m from Marine Drive. The apartment offers generous living space along with a total of three bedrooms and three bathrooms.

The apartment features a spacious living and dining area along with a fully fitted pantry. The master bedroom is well designed with plenty of closet space and a spacious master bathroom. The apartment benefits from a wide range of shared facilities and amenities which include a swimming pool, gym, function area, roof top terrace, secure covered parking garage and 24 hour security.

- Three bedrooms, three bathrooms.
- Both bathrooms equipped with electric hot water.
- Master bedroom equipped with A/C.
- Spacious living and dining area with outdoor terrace.
- Fitted pantry cupboards with provision for oven, cooker & fridge.
- Separate utility/laundry area.
- Covered parking reserved for one vehicle.
- Furniture and appliances seen in the pictures are not included.

Price negotiable upon inspection.

Viewings can be arranged by prior appointment only.
